outline:
1. to bear news, bear tidings, publish, preach, show forth
    1. (Piel)
      1. to gladden with good news
      2. to bear news
      3. to announce (salvation) as good news, preach
    2. (Hithpael) to receive good news
kjv_def: messenger, preach, publish, shew forth, (bear, bring, carry, preach, good, tell good) tidings.
strongs_def: properly, to be fresh, i.e. full (rosy, (figuratively) cheerful); to announce (glad news)
